div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Composition Statusversion: 5.0.0) to Composition Statusversion: 5.0.0)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet ValueSet-R5-composition-status-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
